subject: Football
Children and Childhood
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Through a nonprofit group, USA Football, the N.F.L. has tried to reassure mothers, many of whom decide which sports their children play, that football can be played safely.
snippet: Through a nonprofit group, USA Football, the N.F.L. has tried to reassure mothers, many of whom decide which sports their children play, that football can be played safely.
